trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> types to UI Automation.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" /> class.

Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" />.
This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.HeaderItem" /> enumeration value.
Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" />.
This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
A string that contains "GridViewColumnHeader".
One of the enumeration values.

Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" />.

If <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke" />, this method returns a <see langword="this" /> pointer; otherwise this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="patternInterface" />가 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform" /> 또는 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke" />이면 이 메서드는 <see langword="this" /> 포인터를 반환하고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="null" />을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: 이 자동화 피어와 연결된 요소가 사용자에게 제공된 데이터를 포함하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement" />.
<see langword="false" /> in all cases.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 이 형식 또는 멤버는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 인프라를 지원하며 사용자 코드에서 직접 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element can be moved; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 요소를 이동할 수 있으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element can be resized; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 요소의 크기를 조정할 수 있으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 조정할 수 없으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element can rotate; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 요소를 회전할 수 있으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Absolute screen coordinates of the left side of the control.
Absolute screen coordinates of the top of the control.
